document_data.name: ''Scabby Pugilist Circlet''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Scabby pugilist circlets''''' were [[enchanted]] leather circlets used by [[monk]]s to boost their damage output.
document_data.Powers: This headwear possessed a minor ''martial bravery'' enchantment that somewhat increased [[weapon]] and unarmed damage dealt by the wearer when they were surrounded by two or more enemies.
document_data.History: One such ''pugilist circlet'' once belonged to an infamous [[goblin]] [[barbarian]] named [[Scabby]] who received monk training some years before the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. Scabby's circlet ended up in the hands of a [[tiefling]] child refugee and a trader [[Mattis]] after he reached the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
